journey.title: Professional Journey
paragraphs: With 28 years of experience across various domains and scales of product development, I've established myself as an innovation-driven engineering leader. My expertise spans SaaS web applications, backend and frontend architectures, cloud computing, developer productivity, and DevOps processes.

Most recently served as VP of Engineering at Entropik, leading AI-first consumer research platform development. Previously built and scaled fintech platforms at PayU and Razorpay, and led engineering teams at Intuit for QBO Reporting.

projects.name: Entropik AI Platform
projects.description: AI-powered consumer research platform with GenAI integrations for real-time emotion and behavior analytics
projects.challenge: Traditional research methods were time-consuming and provided limited insights. Brands needed real-time, accurate emotional analytics with AI-native experiences.

projects.name: PayU Vista Platform

projects.challenge: PayU needed to enter the neo banking space with a comprehensive platform that could handle complex financial integrations and regulatory requirements.
projects.solution: Architected and delivered the Vista neo banking platform from scratch, including lending product implementation and GTM strategy for Alpha and Closed User Group Beta phases.
achievements: Led GTM Strategy for Vista platform
Solved intricate integration issues in complex ecosystem

projects.description: Scaled API banking platform with payout engine and multi-bank integrations for fintech services

projects.solution: Built comprehensive payout engine with approval workflows, fund flow control, and multi-bank integrations. Designed services for transaction tracing, auto-retries, and reconciliation.
